characters.name: Raze
characters.description: You see a person. They have grenades on their waist. They are holding a rocket launcher amnd it looks like they wont leave without putting up a fight.

characters.name: Sova
characters.description: You see a tall figure with a piercing blue eye. They have a bow, with three long range, enegry blasts. Looks like they arent going anywhere without a fight.

characters.name: Sage
characters.description: You see a person behind a shining green glow, a spere illuminating above their body

characters.name: Pheonix
characters.description: Flames cover the room you are in, you see a person holding a ball of fire ready to throw.

characters.name: Cypher
characters.description: A man with a wide brimmed hat with a menacing look with a mask covering their lower face

characters.name: Yoru
characters.description: The room flashes blue, blinding you. When your vision recovers you see a man with blue hair staring you down

characters.name: Killjoy
characters.description: You see a figure, they seem happy, but deep down they want your blood. They're wearing a green hat with robots surrounding them

characters.name: Reyna
characters.description: A tall figure emerges from thin air with a purple glow, their arms are coverd in purple fog and tatoos.

characters.name: Viper
characters.description: Out of a large green cloud emerges an intimidating figure with poison around their waist

characters.name: Breach
characters.description: There is a sharp orange flash in the sky, you see a cyborg come out of the walls, looking at you straight in the eyes
